title: Watch: Teacher leads teens in-depth discussion why anal sex is pleasurable, tells students to shop at Target
description:
You may say to yourself, "Self, I always wondered about pleasuring my prostate gland but I feel like it's frowned upon. If only there were a teacher who could guide me through it and offer recommendations." If you are a student at El Dorado High School in -- you guessed it -- California, you're in luck! A teacher did just that. And obviously one of the cool teachers too. You can tell by the way she is sitting on the desk.

Shout out to The Post Millennial. Also, up yours to The Post Millennial for destroying the world I lived in where I didn't know this existed.

No, this is NOT part of the kick of Pride Month 2023. June tends to be when schools decide showing tolerance to Ls, Gs, Bs, especially the Ts, Qs, As, Is, and whatever the hell the +s are means playing show and tell with sex toys. This video is part of everyday anal sex education as outlined in the California Healthy Youth Act. It is about the birds and the bees and all that sodomy.

You don't have to go inside the booty hole you can actually just push on the seam and that stimulates the prostate gland. They...

Right. "They."

...apparently really like that. So that's why, for male and male, anal sex is still very pleasurable because of the fact that it hits the prostate and there's a lot of nerve endings in your booty, as well.

And if you still have trouble stimulating your prostate, they sell toys to help you at Target. But you have to go to where they sell tampons and maxi-pads. The anal sex toys haven't been moved to the children's toy aisle. Yet. After all, this is Target and not your neighborhood CVS.

The state education laws requiring such graphic discussion of anal sex were passed by the state of California in 2019. El Dorado High School is in Orange County, California. The OC voted for Democrat Joe Biden 53% to 44% in 2020.

It's the beginning of June and we need to pace ourselves. Instead of expressing the obvious disgust over what progressives have been allowed to turn our public schools into, I'll close by advising that if you share that disgust, stop voting for the people who promote it.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Reporter interrupts Ron DeSantis talking to voters to ask why he doesn't talk to voters, gets blown away
description:
Has it been a full week since Ron DeSantis has gotten into the presidential race? Because the speed that the campaigns have gotten stupid make it feels like he's been in for a year. And I'm not even talking about DeSantis and Trump supporters chirping at each other in Twitter. Not everyone will see eye to eye there until we have a candidate. I'm focused on our mutual enemy, journalismers.

The new narrative is Ron DeSantis doesn't talk to voters. The same journalismers who bend over and hope for lube every time Joe Biden refuses to talk to them wants to make it an issue that, at an event in New Hampshire, Ron DeSantis didn't take Q&A.

To find out what Ron DeSantis is afraid to talk to voters, an Associated Press reporter -- from the same AP who claims John Fetterman is a fashion icon -- asked DeSantis why he doesn't talk to reporters.

He interrupted DeSantis talking to a reporter to do so.

After declining to take audience questions after his first New Hampshire campaign event today, Ron DeSantis lashed out at a reporter for asking him about it while he was chatting with members of the crowd individually.

Here’s the video, via @NBCNews —> pic.twitter.com/Z2WtLy0JNj
— Jonathan Allen (@jonallendc) June 1, 2023

Dude. Really?

The exact moment an AP reporter asked DeSantis why he isn’t talking to voters: pic.twitter.com/SzTzaLUNer
— Ron DeSantis for President (@DeSantisPrez) June 1, 2023

DeSantis "lashed out" by telling the journalismer he answers voters' questions all the time any time they have a question. Like, for example, in Iowa when he was asked about having a ballot harvesting operation.

DeSantis tells an Iowa voter: “We’re going to do ballot harvesting. I’m doing it, yes.”

He says he won’t “fight with one hand tied behind my back.” pic.twitter.com/tKkr7YFDjX
— Dylan Wells (@dylanewells) June 1, 2023

Political journalismers are the most useless of all other journalismers. They don't care about informing voters. They only want to cheap gotcha. Meanwhile, it's not only the right calling them out on it. While corporate journalismers and the Democrat Party (but I repeat myself) only heard a glitch, The Breakfast Club heard a substantive discussion of issues. And they want to know why the left isn't doing the same.

Even The Breakfast Club, which is very left wing, recognizes the genius in DeSantis doing the Twitter Space and how much more effective he is than Trump.

Ignore the Twitter noise. This is the type of talk that hits with average voters. #DeSantis2024 pic.twitter.com/DLCJgh543H
— Free (@KaladinFree) May 25, 2023

This is phase one of the stupidity. Phase two is when the other GOP candidates jump on the narrative created by corporate media. Phase three is when the narrative turns on those candidates and they all claim corporate media is fake news.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Woke policies intend to make air travel unaffordable for the middle class (but elitists will still be able to fly)
description:
We’ve talked a lot about ESG lately, especially as it relates to LGBT propaganda. But the effects don’t stop there. ESG is designed to control every aspect of your life, including your freedom of movement.

A preview of things to come for Americans is already happening with air travel in Europe, where flying is being banned.You aren't allowed if a train can take you there in under two and a half hours.

France bans short domestic flights to cut carbon emissions youtu.be

Bloomberg goes as far as to brag that affordable airfare will be a thing of the past. “There’s something sad about waving goodbye to the low prices that made globetrotting accessible to millions of people. Especially as those who take the most flights are also most able to swallow the extra costs.”

World travel will essentially become for the elites only. Economic growth isn’t the goal, and they admit it.

Crowder and the gang had A LOT to say about this on today's show.

title: Twitter cancels deal with Daily Wire, labels Matt Walsh doc "hateful conduct" (UPDATE: Elon Musk responds)
description:
UPDATE: Elon Musk has responded via Twitter, and has said. the whole thing is a mistake.

This was a mistake by many people at Twitter. It is definitely allowed.

Whether or not you agree with using someone’s preferred pronouns, not doing so is at most rude and certainly breaks no laws.

I should note that I do personally use someone’s preferred pronouns, just as I…
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) June 1, 2023

That is good to hear. What that means for the event tonight, how the mistake happened, who was responsible for it happening, and what Elon is going to do about it is still unclear.

Original story below.

>

<

This is a breaking story and as of right now it is only The Daily Wire's side of things. So let's unpack what we have. Apparently, Twitter was supposed to have a special airing of the Matt Walsh documentary "What Is A Woman" today for the movie's one-year anniversary. I *think* was part of DW moving all their shows to Twitter, a platform DW CEO Jeremy Boreing once called the "largest free speech platform on the internet."

Sounds like Jeremy has changed his mind.

Twitter canceled a deal with @realdailywire to premiere What is a Woman? for free on the platform because of two instances of “misgendering.”

I’m not kidding.

Here's what happened:🧵1/16
— Jeremy Boreing (@JeremyDBoreing) June 1, 2023

Boreing went on to say: “After reviewing the film, though, Twitter let us know that not only could we no longer purchase the package they offered, they would no longer provide us any support and would actually limit the reach of the film and label it as ‘hateful conduct’ because of ‘misgendering.’”

He was told the movie would be throttled as part of Twitter's "speech not reach" policy.

Matt Walsh has also responded.

Read this thread. We are streaming “What Is A Woman” free for all on Twitter tonight. Despite signing an agreement with us, Twitter now says they will label the film hate speech and suppress it. This is a gross betrayal of the free speech promises they have made to their users. https://t.co/KTn3CjRFSS
— Matt Walsh (@MattWalshBlog) June 1, 2023

Elon Musk has yet to respond and I hope he does because this is confusing. Elon is believed to have bought Twitter BECAUSE the platform censored The Babylon Bee over misgendering a Biden Adminstration official. But also, two months ago Elon has this to say about parents and doctors who sex change their kids.

Any parent or doctor who sterilizes a child before they are a consenting adult should go to prison for life
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) April 14, 2023

Would Elon Musk be censored on Twitter? And does this have to do with new Twitter CEO Linda Yaccarino? This is the same woman who pushed for ADVERTISERS to have more of a say in content moderation on Twitter.

We'll see how Elon responds.

Looks like RUMBLE is the real largest platform in the world for free speech.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: WATCH TODAY'S SHOW: MALEVOLENT TWITTER CANCELS DEAL WITH DAILY WIRE!
description:
Today is June 1st aka the start of Pride Month. The Pentagon forced an Air Force base in Nevada to cancel a drag show. Target continues to get boycotted & it doesn’t look like it’s ending. Also, North Korea was under attack for 20 minutes?!

BREAKING NEWS: Twitter Cancels Deal With The Daily Wire To Stream ‘What Is A Woman?’ Over ‘Misgendering,’ Will Label Film ‘Hateful Conduct’

PENTAGON CANCELS DRAG SHOW

  • Air Force base hosts drag show, defends it as ‘essential’ for ‘readiness of the military’

KOREA FALSE ALARM

  • North Korea satellite launch fails
  • North Korea says it will try again ‘soon’ to launch spy satellite
  • "Wartime alert" for Seoul from the ROK government
  • Kim Jong-un having trouble sleeping, drinking heavily: lawmaker

TRAVEL IS NOW FOR THE RICH ONLY

  • France bans short domestic flights to cut carbon emissions
  • No More Cheap Flights Is the New Reality for Air Travel
  • A ROUTE TO NET ZERO EUROPEAN AVIATION
  • No More Cheap Flights Is the New Reality for Air Travel
  • Global CO2 emissions rose less than initially feared in 2022 as clean energy growth offset much of the impact of greater coal and oil use
  • How much carbon dioxide does the Earth naturally absorb?
  • The global scale, distribution and growth of aviation: Implications for climate change
  • How much is a ton of carbon dioxide?
  • Climate buster: Biden ‘green czar’ John Kerry’s jet unleashes tons of CO2
  • John Kerry @JohnKerry he says we have 9 years to avert a climate catastrophe
  • U.S. sets goal of net-zero aviation emissions by 2050
  • Decarbonizing the aviation sector: Making net zero aviation possible
  • How France’s prized nuclear sector stalled in Europe’s hour of need
  • Amid an energy crisis, Germany turns to the world's dirtiest fossil fuel
  • Over and out: Germany switches off its last nuclear plants

TARGET UPDATE

  • Target in free fall: Retail giant’s market value plunges by $13billion as shares drop by another 2.14% for the ninth consecutive day as chain scrambles to recover from backlash against Pride ‘tuck-friendly’ swimwear range
  • #BoycottTarget takes lead on iTunes: Conservative values trump mainstream artists Taylor Swift, Luke Combs
  • Watch: MSNBC guest proclaims #BoycottTarget is "literal" economic terrorism
  • Trans designer dumped by Target explains how he got smeared as Satanist
  • Kiera Fernandez
  • TCB Talks: Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion | BIPOC Women Rise to Leadership

title: Fastest girl in Connecticut suing state after losing to trans runners: "Two athletes took so many opportunities"
description:
Chelsea Mitchell, the self-professed "fastest girl in Connecticut" wound up losing more than 20 races in High School when Connecticut state law allowed medicore male runners to compete against girls if those boy decided they identified as girls. Mitchell is suing he state to get the law changed to allow other female athletes the opportunity to perform on a level playfield.

The lawsuit was filed in 2020. It's getting revisited thanks to a new interview with Mitchell from the New York Post. As an example of how much more ridiculous the issue has gotten since then, we now have 27-year-old "women" stealing opportunities from 13-year-old girls and bragging about it.

It was during Mitchell's first statewide track meet as a high school sophomore that she discovered boys could compete against girls if those boys said they were girls. First and second place that year were taken by two of those girls who were born boys but said they were girls.

It was just obvious to everyone there that they had a huge advantage. Everyone could see it.

Chelsea ran in the 55-meter dash. The boys' record for it is 6.26. The girls' record is a 6.77, which wouldn't rank her in the top ten for boys'. Though if you need more of a visual aid, this is the thumbnail for our 2020 post when the lawsuit was first filed.

Mitchell goes on to tell the post:

Just two athletes took so many opportunities away from biological females. Even though there were only two of them, they took 15 state championships away from other girls — and there were 85 girls that were directly impacted from them being in the races.

Mitchell had attempted to share her story in 2021 in USA Today. Activists forced the paper to edit her OpEd because she referred to males as "male."

.@USATODAY published our client Chelsea Mitchell’s opinion about the unfairness she experienced being forced to compete against male athletes. But after backlash from the woke mob, editors unilaterally changed Chelsea’s words & called them “hurtful language.” 1/3 pic.twitter.com/tAtzrZgPzt
— Christiana (Holcomb) Kiefer (@ChristianaADF) May 26, 2021

Mitchell now wants to help other girls, especially now that the issue has gotten a lot worse. In 2020, this happened under a Republican president who should have taken the issue seriously. Now under Democrat president Joe Biden, they want to change the rules to allow MORE boys who claim to be girls to compete against girls. Effectively robbing these girls of so many opportunities to learn, grow, and develop through sports. The same opportunities WIll Thomas was afforded before he transitioned to Lia and went from being a mediocre male swimmer to an NCAA champion female swimmer.

A three-judge panel of the Second Circuit ruled against Mitchell's case in December. On June 6th, the argument is being reheard before the full Second Circuit Court of Appeals in New York City. I'm afraid the words "New York City" gives away the eventual outcome. But maybe the three-judge panel will vote to be on the right side of history instead.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Elon Musk reveals a single line of code that's been throttling your tweets since 2012
description:
Anyone who works in right-leaning politics on social media has a degree of paranoia that Big Tech is throttling. It's a paranoia validated by two eyes that view web traffic and driven by leftists and the media (but I repeat myself) not only supporting right-leaning opinions be throttled but actively encouraging more of it. Yet there is no "proof." And as an example of how difficult it is to get "proof," Elon Musk just revealed a line of code that's been throttling tweets since 2012.

Elon made the revelation during an interview with The Babylon Bee. Unclear is if this interview was part of an arrangement to help them pay off the $44 billion they owe Musk.

@elonmusk reveals he’s still uncovering hidden censorship layers in Twitter’s code. pic.twitter.com/b4B1oBiSZU
— The Babylon Bee (@TheBabylonBee) May 31, 2023
We just discovered last week some hidden layer of censorship that was written in 2012. It would basically suppress -- it had a list of words [if you used] that would get massively deamplified.

Musk said there were about a thousand words on the list. One of them was "suck." How much to want to bet one of the other 999 of them was "Romney?" Remember, 2012 was the "What about your gaffes" election.

This is why Big Tech and a president who has a robust plan to ackshually do something about Big Tech (not just virtue signal about it on Big Tech platforms) is a top campaign issue for me. And I'm not even sure what can be done. But if Twitter just found one line of code that has been severely throttling tweets for eleven years -- three presidential elections ago -- how many more lines of secret code have been written since then. People who work for Big Tech have over a decade of growing more bitterly partisan and more outspoken about blocking any opposing viewpoint.

And this is a platform that less than a quarter of America uses. OVER SEVENTY PERCENT of America uses Facebook, who created a portal so the federal government could block posts the federal government deemed "misinformation."

That was blatant. How easy is it for a single coder to sneak a single line of code into these platforms to throttle THEIR political opponents? We need to demand answers.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.
